line_1: To scorn the villain's artful mask;
Shew her bright Virgin Face, and scorn the Satyr's Mask.
line_2: Henceforth she shall pursue a Nobler Task,

line_1: A shallow brain behind a serious mask,
line_2: An oracle within an empty cask,

line_1: For Innocence ever looks through a thin mask;
line_2: I pitied her feelings, and saw what she'd ask,

line_1: Not skulk or put on a prudential mask,
line_2: As if their duty were a desp'rate task;

line_1: In pageant quaint, in motley mask,
line_2: Not vain she finds the charmful task,

line_1: And his, whene'er he'd act, thy choicest Mask.
line_2: Thou ne'er deny'd'st whate'er he deign'd to ask,

line_1: Alone, yet scorning Caution's coward mask,
line_2: Will I encounter this adventurous task;
